testcase.name: Create a new book
testcase.system-out: @BookAPI Scenario: Create a new book &amp#27;[90m# src/test/resources/features/book_api.feature:7&amp#27;[0m [ExtentListener] Creating feature node: book_api [ExtentListener] Started scenario: Create a new book (feature: book_api) Book JSON: { "title": "Mystic of Echoes", "author": "Arjun Menon", "genre": "Romance", "available": true, "publishedYear": 2003 } &amp#27;[32mGiven &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI have a random book payload&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# library.BookAPI.i_have_a_random_book_payload()&amp#27;[0m Response Body: { "id" : 35, "bookId" : 35, "author" : "Arjun Menon", "genre" : "Romance", "available" : true, "publishedYear" : 2003, "title" : "Mystic of Echoes", "_links" : { "self" : { "href" : "http://10.10.2.73:8080/books/35" }, "book" : { "href" : "http://10.10.2.73:8080/books/35" } } } Status Code: 201 Stored Book ID: 35 &amp#27;[32mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mCreate Book Request&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# library.BookAPI.Create_Book_Request()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe Book response status code should be &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m201&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# library.BookAPI.the_response_status_code_should_be(java.lang.Integer)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe Book response should contain &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"id"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# library.BookAPI.the_response_should_contain(java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m [ExtentListener] Finished scenario: Create a new book
